name: Mismatch Patch
description:
Welcome to Mismatch Patch, a small community in a medium city with a big problem. The Summer Santa messed up everyone's gifts and now it's up to you to fix it!

FYI: The goal of the game is to make sure everyone has the gift that they wanted. Some NPC's may need to be interacted with multiple times, and some won't have dialogue options until you possess a certain Item. 

MOUSE - To Look
WASD - To Move

Click - To Interact

'E' - To Open Inventory

Credit:

 "Stayin' lazy" - Godmode

Made for GeoJam 2021
